title: godoc: rewrite "http://golang.org/doc/" to "/doc/"
body:
by **satnam6502**: 
This broken link may be worth fixing:
http://golang.org/doc/articles/laws_of_reflection.html 
Linked from http://weekly.golang.org/pkg/reflect/ 
I assume it should be linked to  http://blog.golang.org/2011/09/laws-of-reflection.html

Cheers,

Satnam

Before filing a bug, please check whether it has been fixed since
the latest release: run "hg pull", "hg update default", rebuild, and
retry
what you did to
reproduce the problem.  Thanks.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Goto  http://weekly.golang.org/pkg/reflect/ 
2. Follow link http://golang.org/doc/articles/laws_of_reflection.html 

What is the expected output?
Probably http://blog.golang.org/2011/09/laws-of-reflection.html

What do you see instead?
No such page.


Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
Not a compiler issue.

Which operating system are you using?
Not relevant.

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
Not relevant.

Please provide any additional information below.
